Context:
To access Brightspace, the learning platform of George Brown College, visit learn.georgebrown.ca. You will need this information to log in: "Visit D2L-Brightspace". If you encounter issues with logging into Brightspace or your GBC account, contact the Help Desk at helpdesk@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-5000, ext. 4357. Additionally, resources like demos and student FAQs are available to help navigate Brightspace. For more information, sign up for college updates or contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca (416-415-2000) or the TTY number: 1-877-515-5559.

George Brown College resources and contacts:
- Brightspace login: Visit D2L-Brightspace
- Help Desk: helpdesk@georgebrown.ca, 416-415-5000, ext. 4357
- Student FAQ: Not explicitly stated in the text
- Demos and tools: Available in Brightspace
- Application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more: Sign Up Now
